Description: Welcome to this eco-friendly oasis nestled in the heart of Green Oaks. This charming 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home boasts energy-efficient features such as solar panels and a well-insulated structure. Natural light floods the living spaces, highlighting the beautiful hardwood floors and eco-conscious finishes. The open-concept kitchen and dining area lead to a spacious backyard with a vegetable garden, perfect for the eco-conscious family. Embrace sustainable living without compromising on style in this Green Oaks gem.
Neighborhood Description: Green Oaks is a close-knit, environmentally-conscious community with access to organic grocery stores, community gardens, and bike paths. Take a stroll through the nearby Green Oaks Park or grab a cup of coffee at the cozy Green Bean Cafe. With easy access to public transportation and bike lanes, commuting is a breeze.

Description: Discover modern living in Maplewood with this spacious 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom home. Featuring a contemporary design with sleek finishes, this home offers an open floor plan, a gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and a master suite with a walk-in closet. The backyard includes a patio perfect for outdoor dining and entertainment.
Neighborhood Description: Maplewood is a vibrant community with excellent schools, parks, and a variety of dining options. Enjoy the Maplewood Farmers' Market on weekends and explore the scenic Maplewood Trail. Convenient access to major highways makes commuting to the city effortless.

Description: This luxurious 5-bedroom, 4-bathroom home in Riverdale offers elegance and comfort. With high ceilings, large windows, and a grand staircase, this home is perfect for entertaining. The kitchen features granite countertops and a central island, while the master suite includes a spa-like bathroom and a private balcony.
Neighborhood Description: Riverdale is known for its picturesque views and family-friendly atmosphere. The Riverdale Park offers outdoor activities for all ages, and the local community center hosts various events throughout the year. Excellent schools and a strong sense of community make Riverdale a sought-after neighborhood.

Description: Step into luxury with this beautiful 4-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom home in Pine Valley. Features include a formal dining room, a cozy family room with a fireplace, and a chef's kitchen with custom cabinetry. The landscaped backyard with a pool is ideal for summer gatherings.
Neighborhood Description: Pine Valley offers a suburban retreat with top-rated schools and abundant green spaces. Residents enjoy access to Pine Valley Golf Course and Pine Valley Shopping Center. The community is known for its peaceful streets and friendly neighbors.

Description: Experience waterfront living in this stunning 6-bedroom, 5-bathroom home in Lakeview. The expansive deck and private dock are perfect for enjoying the serene lake environment.
Neighborhood Description: Lakeview is a prestigious community with exclusive lake access, excellent schools, and upscale amenities. Enjoy boating, fishing, and lakeside picnics, or dine at one of the many waterfront restaurants. Lakeview offers a perfect blend of luxury and tranquility.
